data.name: Smart Helmet System
data.description: Driving two wheelers is not as safe as driving cars, to address this safety issue created a smart kit and detect whether the driver has worn helmet or not using IoT. Along with it we designed an Android App to track driver's location and send SOS to his emergency contacts using Google Maps AP

data.name: Automatic Attendance System
data.description: To avoid the manual entry of attendance done by teachers, we designed a responsive website on which the teacher will have to upload the photo of the attendance sheet, then using OCR it automatically converts image into text and stores it into the database. The website is made in React JS and used MySQL for database

data.name: Solapur District Police Transfer Website
data.description: To make the transfer process of the entire Solapur Police Force online, we created a website in React JS using Firebase as a database. The website is being used for the transfers of 400-500 policemen thus saving time, human efforts and avoiding manual errors.

data.name: Gun Simulator Project
data.description: Working to create a software to automize the placement and angle of gun to hit the target using Python under Dr, Prof. Girish Potdar. This project is for DRDO and can be used by the Indian Army

data.name: Mars Image Classificationr
data.description: Analysing different deep learning models to increase the accuracy of images taken by Nasa's Mars Rover. Working on Transformers(ViT), Efficient Nets, CNNs to find the best suited mode
